title: Idealized Head
description:
Green basalt head of a man with ovoid skull, shaved head; eyes outlined in high relief, eyebrows not indicated. Remains of back pillar with pyramidal top. On rear of right side, remains of rolled edge of garment. Matte finish. 
Condition: Poor. Nose broken, left ear lost and right ear damaged. Mouth, chin and back pillar battered. Forehead and top of head scarred.
section: The Late Period through the Beginning of the Roman Occupation

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
